products.title: Cinnamon Rolls
products.description: Hand-crafted sourdough with a perfectly crisp crust and tender, airy crumb. Naturally leavened over 24 hours for complex flavor.

products.title: Chocolate Walnut Biscotti
products.description: Flaky, buttery layers that shatter with every bite. Made with premium European butter and traditional lamination techniques.

products.title: Cinnamon Rolls
products.description: Soft, pillowy rolls swirled with cinnamon sugar and topped with cream cheese frosting. A weekend favorite.

products.title: Garlic Knots
products.description: Classic French baguette with a golden crust and chewy interior. Perfect for sandwiches or alongside dinner.

products.title: Blueberry Morning Bun
products.description: Delicate pastry filled with seasonal fruit and light custard. A refined breakfast treat.

products.title: Rosemary Focaccia
products.description: Herb-infused Italian flatbread with a crispy bottom and pillowy center. Drizzled with olive oil and sea salt.
